entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
